title: [4K] 루카스 그레이엄 (Lukas Graham) - Love Someone (Live In Seoul, 2019)
content: 2019년 1월 24일 밴드 '루카스 그레이엄'의 첫 단독 내한공연 4K 실황 라이브! 최초공개 시와 모바일에서는 최대 화질이 1080p로 보입니다. 4K는 데스크탑에서 즐겨주세요:)

title: “난 세상을 정복했었네” | 20년간 우리 곁에 있는 밴드 ‘콜드플레이’ 노래모음 (playlist)
content: ABOUT COLDPLAY Since forming at university in London, Coldplay have gone on to become one of the planet’s most popular acts, selling more than 100 million copies of their eight Number One albums, which have spawned a string of hits including Yellow, Clocks, Fix You, Paradise, Viva La Vida, A Sky Full Of Stars.

title: Imagine Dragons - Thunder
content: Their videos are confusing but so fun to watch, and the music never gets old! You can listen to any of their songs 50 times in a row and never get bored!!! Never stop coming out with music like this imagine dragons!
